name: demon cat
dieMessage: a demon @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@cat@c-reset@ breathes his last breath in a pool of @c-bold-on@@c-red@blood@c-reset@

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ tries to bite @player-name@ in the leg!
The @npc-color-name@ growls and charges slightly at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ howls maniacally to call its pack!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ jumps into the air toward and lands a critical attack! @player-name@!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ jumps into the air toward @player-name@!
